Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29191658]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1.0 μM), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=2.0 μM), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=2.0 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=2.0 μM);Fungus:Candida albicans (MIC=1.0 μM).Cancer cell lines:NCI-H157 (IC50=3.464 μM), U251MG (IC50=3.087 μM), PC-3 (IC50=3.051 μM), MDA-MB-435s (IC50=3.483 μM), HMEC-1 (IC50=9.976 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29191658]HC50=44.64 μM against horse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria, Gram-negative bacteria and fungi. Has hemolytic activity.
